body_text: Do we actually need this? Self-repair isn't meant to work outside of Firefox, and it was introduced in, like, Firefox 30-something (@gregglind knows for sure) where native Promises were already a thing . The preview will also eventually require the system add-on to be installed, so trying to make it compatible with other browsers will eventually fail.
